advert.title: Vauxhall Vivaro 2.0 CDTi Sportive 2900 Crewcab 5dr (LWB, Euro 5)

paragraphs: All vehicles sanitised before and after viewing including touch points with anti bacterial spray.
Disposable seat covers and gloves available.
We offer un-escorted test drives that is we do not get in the car with you.
We offer a full no contact sale.

bulletPoints: Detailed handover to get to know your new vehicle
paragraphs: Convenient Home delivery to your door on a day / time by agreement. Your vehicle will be transported by our delivery driver with Covid 19 regulations followed and social distanced practiced.
There's a Â£1.50 per mile charge for home delivery

bulletPoints: View the vehicle from your home
Arrange a time to suit you
paragraphs: Live video presentation by arrangement with Andrew the proprietor

bulletPoints: Collect a vehicle at a time to suit you
paragraphs: Please get in touch for more information we are here to help
